mapper.sql: wpywd.PLAN_WATER_ID_ planWaterId, wpywd.COMPANY_ID_ companyId, wpywd.PLAN_YEAR_ planYear, wpywd.PLAN_YEAR_AVG_WATER_ planYearAvgWater, wpywd.PLAN_YEAR_EDIT_WATER_ planYearEditWater, wpywd.ACT_YEAR_WATER_ actYearWater, wpywd.IS_OVERPROOF_ isOverproof, wpywd.IS_DELTE_ isDelte, wpywd.CRT_TIME_ crtTime, wpywd.UPD_TIME_ updTime
mapper.select: select , com.COMPANY_NAME_ companyName, com.COMPANY_CODE_ companyCode, com.IS_IMPORT_ isImport from WA_PLAN_YEAR_WATER_DATA wpywd, WA_COMPANY_INFO com WHERE wpywd.COMPANY_ID_ = com.COMPANY_ID_ AND wpywd.PLAN_WATER_ID_ = #{planWaterId}
mapper.insert:
insert into WA_PLAN_YEAR_WATER_DATA
PLAN_WATER_ID_,
COMPANY_ID_,
PLAN_YEAR_,
PLAN_YEAR_AVG_WATER_,
PLAN_YEAR_EDIT_WATER_,
ACT_YEAR_WATER_,
IS_OVERPROOF_,
IS_DELTE_,
CRT_TIME_,
UPD_TIME_,
#{planWaterId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{planYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{planYearAvgWater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{planYearEditWater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actYearWater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isOverproof,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{isDelte,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
UPDATE WA_PLAN_YEAR_WATER_DATA wpywd
PLAN_WATER_ID_ = #{planWaterId} ,
COMPANY_ID_ = #{companyId} ,
PLAN_YEAR_ = #{planYear} ,
PLAN_YEAR_AVG_WATER_ = #{planYearAvgWater} ,
PLAN_YEAR_EDIT_WATER_ = #{planYearEditWater} ,
ACT_YEAR_WATER_ = #{actYearWater} ,
IS_OVERPROOF_ = #{isOverproof} ,
IS_DELTE_ = #{isDelte} ,
CRT_TIME_ = #{crtTime} ,
UPD_TIME_ = #{updTime}
WHERE wpywd.PLAN_WATER_ID_ = #{planWaterId}
